PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-12882017-10-26ESDC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActOld Age Security Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Old Age Security Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the OLD AGE SECURITY REGULATIONS in order to define which information can be used to determine the marital status of potential Guaranteed Income Supplement (GIS) beneficiaries to help enable their automatic enrolment for the GIS. Automatic enrolment will improve services and create administrative efficiencies by maximizing the number of seniors who can receive the GIS automatically, thus removing the burden for seniors of completing applications and reducing administrative costs for the Government.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0225 Publication Date: 2017-11-15
AttachmentsAttachment

Automatic enrolment will improve services and create administrative efficiencies by maximizing the number of seniors who can receive the GIS automatically, thus removing the burden for seniors of completing applications and reducing administrative costs for the Government.
